channel.title: Probably the Dumbest Gamemode Idea | Parallel Universes
channel.description:
# [color=#ff0000]P[/color][color=#ff7100]a[/color][color=#ffa900]r[/color][color=#ffd100]a[/color][color=#fff800]l[/color][color=#8bff00]l[/color][color=#00ff07]e[/color][color=#00ff9a]l[/color] [color=#00ffe8]U[/color][color=#00ddff]n[/color][color=#0040ff]i[/color][color=#3100ff]v[/color][color=#4d00ff]e[/color][color=#6900ff]r[/color][color=#b800ff]s[/color][color=#ff00ec]e[/color][color=#ff009d]s[/color]
## [color=#ff0000]P[/color][color=#ff1700]r[/color][color=#ff2d00]o[/color][color=#ff4400]b[/color][color=#ff5a00]a[/color][color=#ff7100]b[/color][color=#ff7c00]l[/color][color=#ff8700]y[/color] [color=#ff9e00]t[/color][color=#ffa900]h[/color][color=#ffb900]e[/color] [color=#ffd800]W[/color][color=#ffe800]o[/color][color=#fff800]r[/color][color=#ecf900]s[/color][color=#d8fa00]t[/color] [color=#b2fd00]S[/color][color=#9efe00]F[/color][color=#8bff00]o[/color][color=#6fff01]L[/color] [color=#38ff04]I[/color][color=#1cff06]d[/color][color=#00ff07]e[/color][color=#00ff24]a[/color] [color=#00ff5f]t[/color][color=#00ff7d]h[/color][color=#00ff9a]a[/color][color=#00ffaa]t[/color] [color=#00ffc9]s[/color][color=#00ffd8]o[/color][color=#00ffe8]m[/color][color=#00f8ed]e[/color][color=#00f1f1]o[/color][color=#00ebf6]n[/color][color=#00e4fa]e[/color] [color=#00beff]h[/color][color=#009eff]a[/color][color=#007fff]s[/color] [color=#0040ff]h[/color][color=#0a33ff]a[/color][color=#1426ff]d[/color] [color=#270dff]t[/color][color=#3100ff]h[/color][color=#3a00ff]e[/color] [color=#4d00ff]d[/color][color=#5600ff]i[/color][color=#6000ff]s[/color][color=#6900ff]p[/color][color=#7900ff]l[/color][color=#8900ff]e[/color][color=#9800ff]a[/color][color=#a800ff]s[/color][color=#b800ff]u[/color][color=#c600fb]r[/color][color=#d400f7]e[/color] [color=#f100f0]t[/color][color=#ff00ec]o[/color] [color=#ff00cc]r[/color][color=#ff00bd]e[/color][color=#ff00ad]a[/color][color=#ff009d]d[/color]
# [color=#57aaca]T[/color][color=#57b5bc]h[/color][color=#56c0ae]e[/color] [color=#68b9ba]B[/color][color=#7aa6d4]a[/color][color=#8c94ee]s[/color][color=#a990f0]i[/color][color=#c78cf2]c[/color][color=#e488f4]s[/color]
Players will get two classes (of the same wincon) Each day, the game will swap universes. Giving them their other class and possibly a different gamemode
King, Prince, Mastermind, Assassin, Cult Leader, Spiritualist/Revenant and Non-Killing Neutrals will stay the exact same on swap.
Neutral Killers turn into a different Neutral Killer
If a player was converted, they will change into their other class's convert on universe swap
(yes Cultists have to make 2 cult alt sets)
Players will only flip their first class on death which is why a new investigative will come into play The Archaeologist which converts into the Gravedigger
This mode is also able to mix gamemodes because why not. (It will only work on gamemodes that I include in this list with some minor changes)
# [color=#0638b0]G[/color][color=#1240af]a[/color][color=#1d48ae]m[/color][color=#294fac]e[/color][color=#3457ab]m[/color][color=#405faa]o[/color][color=#4b67a9]d[/color][color=#576ea7]e[/color] [color=#6e7ea5]C[/color][color=#7584a7]l[/color][color=#7c89a9]a[/color][color=#848fab]s[/color][color=#8b95ad]s[/color] [color=#99a0b0]A[/color][color=#a1a6b2]l[/color][color=#a8abb4]t[/color][color=#afb1b6]s[/color]
### **[color=#3fb4e9]R[/color][color=#40b2e5]e[/color][color=#40afe2]t[/color][color=#41adde]u[/color][color=#41abda]r[/color][color=#42a8d7]n[/color] [color=#43a4cf]o[/color][color=#43a1cc]f[/color] [color=#449dc4]t[/color][color=#459ac1]h[/color][color=#4598bd]e[/color] [color=#4293b7]B[/color][color=#4090b4]l[/color][color=#3f8db1]u[/color][color=#3d8bae]e[/color] [color=#3a85a7]D[/color][color=#3883a4]r[/color][color=#3780a1]a[/color][color=#357d9e]g[/color][color=#347b9b]o[/color][color=#327898]n[/color]** [details=Show] **Good King -> Unseen King** **Evil King/Devout King -> BD King** **Prince -> Kidnapper** (This Kidnapper is Convert Immune) **Mastermind/Cult Leader - > Negotiator** (will have night immunity if player was Mastermind. Will also be unable to be replaced if the other universe is an Unseen universe) **Assassin/Oldest Cult -> Insurgent**
**Skeletal Snakekeeper -> Death Enforcer** **Skeletal Serpent -> Death Knight**
(As well as this, if you are a non killing Blue Dragon and there are no BD Killers. You will turn into the Insurgent. You will turn back into your converted Cult class on phase swap if the other Universe consists of Cultists.)
(Players that are the Assassin in the other world that has a classtype of Killing in this universe will not turn into an Insurgent) [/details]
## [color=#68c16a]S[/color][color=#66bb68]i[/color][color=#63b465]e[/color][color=#61ae63]g[/color][color=#5ea760]e[/color] [color=#599a5b]o[/color][color=#559157]n[/color] [color=#4c7e4e]X[/color][color=#487449]e[/color][color=#446b45]d[/color]
[details=Show] **Prince -> First Mate** (definitely not obvious) **Skeletal Snakekeeper -> Death Knight** **Skeletal Serpent -> Death Enforcer**
(and because Xed is pretty much a reskin, nothing else) (Players will still be on plunder in a universe change) [/details]
# [color=#b167bc]U[/color][color=#a56abc]n[/color][color=#986dbc]i[/color][color=#8c70bc]v[/color][color=#8073bc]e[/color][color=#7376bc]r[/color][color=#6779bc]s[/color][color=#6786bc]e[/color] [color=#67a1bb]U[/color][color=#67afbb]n[/color][color=#67bcbb]i[/color][color=#6bbcc1]q[/color][color=#70bbc6]u[/color][color=#74bbcc]e[/color] [color=#7dbad7]C[/color][color=#81b9dc]l[/color][color=#94a9d5]a[/color][color=#a798ce]s[/color][color=#ba88c7]s[/color][color=#cd77c0]e[/color][color=#e067b9]s[/color]
(These classes are unable to be given to two people across a game and will be immune to Outsmart/Swap Out) * Priest/Soulcatcher
**Double Unique ≠ Unique**
[details="Examples"] Billy Phase One is Priest, In Phase 2. He is a Private Investigator. Nobody else can be Priest/Soulcatcher in Phase 2
Example of Unique. Not Double Unique Patrick is Hunter in Phase One and he is a Mystic in Phase 2 David is a Mystic in Phase One and he is a Sheriff in Phase 2 (rng was weird here, okay) [/details]
# [color=steblue]Blue Dragon Class Changes:[/color] [details=Show] > ## [color=steblue]The Archaeologist (Unofficial Class)[/color] :crossed_swords: > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] > **Outsmart (Day)** - Change targeted player's class into their other class card for the current phase. (can target self) - 2 uses (If from another gamemode. If the class card is from another gamemode, they will turn into the current counterpart from that gamemode) > **Study (Night)** - You will see a pairing of class types. The result will be determined by the other class card they have. The pairings are Killer/Offensive, Support/Social and Special/Investigative - Infinite uses > **Uncover (Night)** - See the other class of the dead player specified. - Infinite uses *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=purple]**The Gravedigger**[/color] or the [color=darkred]**The Seeker**[/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Points: 2 - Each ability costs: 1**[/color]
> ## [color=steblue]The Sheriff[/color] :crossed_swords: > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] > **Scout (Day)** - Scout a player. You will know if that player gets converted at any point afterwards… The scout will stay on the player until you command them to watch someone else - Infinite uses **Expert Investigation (Night)** - Learn if your target is a member of the Unseen. - Infinite uses *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=purple]**The Marshal**[/color] - Does not appear in Cult games
> ## [color=steblue]The Paladin[/color] :crossed_swords: > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] > **Cleanse (Day)** - Your Test of Faith ability will also kill your target if they a Cult member tonight. - 2 uses > **Test of Faith (Night)** - Determine if targeted player is a member of the Cult - Infinite uses > **Smite (Night)** - If targeted player has a conversion attempted on them or you. You will kill the Cult Leader trying to convert them, bypassing Night Immunity. - 2 uses (Cannot be used before Night 3) *Your objective is to defeat the Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=darkred]**The Seeker**[/color] - Does not appear in Unseen games > [color=darkred]**Cult Points: 2 - Each ability costs: 1**[/color] > **(Cleanse): Flame of Mithras (Day)** - Make targeted player appear as a member of the Cult for the night. (They will also be able to be killed by Paladins using Cleanse) - 3 uses > **(Test of Faith): Test of Mithras (Night)** - Determine a player’s current class if they are part of the Blue Dragon. - Infinite uses > **(Smite): Bolt of Mithras (Night)** - If targeted player is attacked, kill the attacker. Bypassing night immunity. The attacker will show up as a Cult Leader on death - 2 uses [/details]
# [color=purple]Unseen Class Changes:[/color] [details=Show] > ## [color=purple]The Gravedigger (Unofficial Class)[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] > **Outsmart (Day)** - Change targeted player's class into their other class for the day. (can target self) - 2 uses (If from another gamemode. They will turn into the current counterpart from that gamemode) > **Study (Night)** - See targeted player's class type that they are not using right now. - Infinite uses > **Uncover (Night)** - See the other class of the dead player specified and their previous action. - Infinite uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> ## [color=purple]The Marshal[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] > **Expose (Day)** - Discover what day abilities were used on target player at the start of the night. Day abilities with no specific target count as targeting self. - 3 uses > **Probe (Night)** - Determine a player’s current class if they are part of the Blue Dragon. - Infinite uses > **Snoop (Night)** - Choose a list of classes, with no size restrictions. You will know whether or not your target is one of those classes. - 4 uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Credit to **NuclearBurrito** (I just stole his Marshal)
[/details]
# [color=darkred]Cult Class Changes:[/color] [details=Show] > ## [color=darkred]**The Seeker** :crossed_swords: [/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Investigative**[/color] > **Expose (Day)** - Discover what day abilities were used on target player at the start of the night. Day abilities with no specific target count as targeting self. - 2 uses > **Gaze (Night)** - Learn a player’s class type. - 2 uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
[/details]
# [color=51CD46]Siege on Xed Class Changes:[/color] [details=Show] > ## [color=51CD46]The Scuba Diver[/color] :crossed_swords: > [color=51CD46]**Green Kraken Investigative**[/color] > **Swap Out (Day)** - Change targeted player's class into their other class card for the current phase. (can target self) - 2 uses (If from another gamemode. If the class card is from another gamemode, they will turn into the current counterpart from that gamemode) > **Expedition (Night)** - Find out a night result used on targeted player in the previous universe - Infinite uses > **Swim (Night)** - See the other class of the dead player specified. - Infinite uses > **Extra Air (Plunder)** - See the other class of a dead player specified and see their previous night result from that player. (Will not show Conversions) *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
> Converts into [color=purple]**The Sea Lord**[/color] or the [color=darkred]**The Seeker**[/color] > [color=darkred]**Cult Points: 2 - Each ability costs: 1**[/color]
> ## [color=purple]The Sea Lord[/color] > [color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] > **Swap Out (Day)** - Change targeted player's class into their other class card for the current phase. (can target self) - 2 uses (If from another gamemode. If the class card is from another gamemode, they will turn into the current counterpart from that gamemode) > **Expedition (Night)** - Find out a night result used on targeted player in the previous universe. This will also make them appear as a member of the Unseen - 4 uses > **Swim (Night)** - See the other class of the dead player specified. - Infinite uses > **Extra Air (Plunder)** - See the other class of a dead player specified. You will also be able to find out exactly what they did in that time *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
(insert priest remake here)
[/details]
# [color=steblue]RotBD Class Changes:[/color]
#### Faction cap stays consistent the entire game.
#### Guaranteed classes will be Guaranteed in both modes.
#### All other class cards are taken from their original thread
